snippet: KONCIUS--David. We note with sorrow the passing of our member David Koncius and extend sincerest condolences to his bereaved family. Rabbi Peter J. Rubinstein and President David B. Edelson, Central Synagogue of New York City...
lead_paragraph: KONCIUS--David. We note with sorrow the passing of our member David Koncius and extend sincerest condolences to his bereaved family. Rabbi Peter J. Rubinstein and President David B. Edelson, Central Synagogue of New York City
